page.title: 04Ad Astra First School.
page.content: We visited Ad Astra and talked to the children to see what they thought of their school.We asked them questions on sport,lessons,uniform and teachers. We also asked them what subjects they liked.We found that the most popular was Maths and the least English.They call it Writing or Language.They all enjoyed their lessons,and liked their teachers.They liked wearing school uniform because it was sensible.They also said that they liked it being yellow,grey and white.We asked them whether they thought that girls should be allowed to wear trousers and they all said NO.They liked their school so much that they didn't really want to move up to Middle School.They all enjoyed running and rounders but they don't play football.Their school has 347 pupils.
